title: 820-3115 shutdown if hard drive is connected
message:
This board seems very clean and no liquide damage. If I disconnect hard drive it power and blinking folder appear and it keeps on. BUT
If I connect USB drive or Hard drive to usb it start loading and power off in 12-14 seg.
Any suspect?

title: 820-3115 shutdown if hard drive is connected
message: Try another BIOS(save the old!!), but besides that it is probably a time waster. Could look around CPU power supple too for corrosion or knocked off parts.

title: 820-3115 shutdown if hard drive is connected
message: With donor bios works ok. Should I put new clean ME or you can fix this?

title: 820-3115 shutdown if hard drive is connected
message: You copy the old ME to the working BIOS.

title: 820-3115 shutdown if hard drive is connected
820-3115 shutdown if hard drive is connected
message: You can find all this with Google. 0x0-0x190000 is ME
